r.d:
This extension provides the accepted PSR interfaces, so they can be used in an extension.
See http://www.php-fig.org/psr/
r.n: - Test failures on PHP 8 in psr-http-client and psr-http-message due to changes in inheritance - Compile failures with clang - Compatibility with API changes to PHP 8 in psr-log (@remicollet) - Report proper default value in reflection for LoggerInterface - PHP 8 only
